title: Easy tomato and pepper low fat soup
ingredients: ['2 onions, chopped', '2 yellow peppers, chopped', '30g mushrooms, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed (or a sprinkle of dried)', '2x400g tins of chopped tomatoes', '3 teaspoons of dried mixed herbs', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 sprays low fat cooking spray or a little oil']
